boCuts.name: Play Discography
boCuts.desc: Search iTunes for an artist's entire catalog, and automatically start playing in Apple Music

boCuts.name: Airdrop Contact
boCuts.desc: Airdrop your contact without having to search in Contacts app

boCuts.name: Apple Notes OCR
boCuts.desc: Search your notes and pull out the text to your clipboard. Use this to convert your handwritten notes into plain text

boCuts.name: Alien Sightings
boCuts.desc: Pulls data from The National UFO Reporting Center. You can input an address and read reported UFO sightings from around the world.

boCuts.name: Markup And Share
boCuts.desc: Select a photo from your Library or Clipboard, and jump straight to the markup editor for quick sharing

boCuts.name: Make QR Link
boCuts.desc: Generate a QR code from a link in your Clipboard or from one you manually enter

boCuts.name: Bcc Group Text
boCuts.desc: Send the same content to many contacts individually without starting a group chat

boCuts.name: Random Number Generator
boCuts.desc: Repeatedly generate a random number within a range. Works best in the Today View widget
